listingCreated.title: Bottle Listing Created
listingCreated.description: You have successfully created a new bottle listing for {{bottleCount}} bottles at {{locationAddress}}.

listingDeleted.title: Bottle Listing Deleted
listingDeleted.description: Your bottle listing for {{bottleCount}} bottles at {{locationAddress}} has been successfully deleted.

pickupRequestReceived.title: New Pickup Request
pickupRequestReceived.description: {{volunteerName}} has requested to pick up your {{bottleCount}} bottles at {{locationAddress}}.

pickupRequestAcceptedByOwner.title: Pickup Request Accepted
pickupRequestAcceptedByOwner.description: You have accepted {{volunteerName}}'s request to pick up your {{bottleCount}} bottles.

pickupRequestCompletedByOwner.title: Pickup Completed
pickupRequestCompletedByOwner.description: The pickup for your listing at {{locationAddress}} has been completed.

pickupRequestCreated.title: Pickup Request Sent
pickupRequestCreated.description: You have sent a pickup request for {{bottleCount}} bottles at {{locationAddress}}.

pickupRequestAccepted.title: Pickup Request Accepted
pickupRequestAccepted.description: Your pickup request for {{bottleCount}} bottles at {{locationAddress}} has been accepted.

pickupRequestRejected.title: Pickup Request Rejected
pickupRequestRejected.description: Your pickup request for {{locationAddress}} has been rejected.

pickupRequestCompleted.title: Pickup Completed
pickupRequestCompleted.description: You have successfully completed the pickup of {{bottleCount}} bottles at {{locationAddress}}.

transactionCompleted.title: Transaction Completed
transactionCompleted.descriptionOwner: The transaction for your listing at {{locationAddress}} is complete. You have earned {{ownerAmount}} HUF.
transactionCompleted.descriptionVolunteer: The transaction is complete. You have earned {{volunteerAmount}} HUF.

ratingReceived.title: New Rating Received
ratingReceived.description: You have received a {{ratingValue}}-star rating from {{raterName}}.
ratingReceived.descriptionWithComment: You have received a {{ratingValue}}-star rating from {{raterName}} with the comment: "{{comment}}"

default.title: New Notification
default.description: You have a new notification of type: {{type}}.
